channel.title: [317] Colors in sendMessage
channel.description:
Hey all,
I've seen a few releases where people had colors in their sendMessage's. Now I would like to add this myself, and found out some guy named Unborn had a tutorial on how to add this. The problem is, I can't find this tutorial anywhere. Does anyone know where I can find this tutorial, or does anyone know how to add this?
EDIT: I need to know how to add colours to sendMessages in my CLIENT. My client doesn't know what to do with @blu@ etc yet.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [317] Colors in sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:2, topic:329684”]//colors
Those are all the possible colors.

Here’s how it works:

sendMessage("@yel@Message here");

And yeah.[/quote]

-_-"
I’m not a complete idiot you know.

It only works if you have it added in your client. My client does not have it implented.
That’s why I got to know how to add it in your client.

Edit: Just noticed I didn’t say I needed to know how to implent it into your client. Sorry for the misunderstanding.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Colors in sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

lol there you go

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Colors in sendMessage
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

@red@ @blu@ @dba@ @gre@ @yel@ @whi@ @cya@ @mag@ @bla@ @lre@ @dre@ @dbl@ @or1@ @or2@ @or3@ @gr1@ @gr2@ @gr3@

Those are all the possible colors.

Here’s how it works:

sendMessage("@yel@Message here");

And yeah.

Read full topic
